span.div: Healthcare isn’t just about health anymore. It’s about caring for family, friends, finances, and personal life goals. It’s about living life fully. At Humana, we want to help people everywhere, including our associates, lead their best lives. We support our associates to be happier, healthier, and more productive in their professional and personal lives. We encourage our people to build relationships that inspire, support, and challenge them. We promote lifelong well-being by giving our associates fresh perspective, new insights, and exciting opportunities to grow their careers. At Humana, we’re seeking innovative people who want to make positive changes in their lives, the lives of our members, and the healthcare industry as a whole.

td.div: The Sales Director leads the execution of a market’s sales and retention strategies/activities to achieve goals for the 2+ PODs for all products and solutions. They assist the ARM, as needed, to develop engagement and enrollment strategies that aligned to, and support, market and regional priorities. They translate strategies from their Market Vice President (MVP) into actionable tasks for execution. They are responsible for 2+ POD sales, retention, and cross-sales performance. They oversee sales and retention capabilities of the team, managing resources, and supports relationships with key clients and brokers/consultants in the market. The Sales Director provides ARM development through training, coaching, monitoring performance, conducting ‘ride alongs’ during client and broker interactions. The Sales Director shares market data and information with their MVP to assist in strategy development. They monitor performance against the strategy and make adjustments based on current data and information.

b.i: Content assumes all lines of business unless otherwise noted. Responsibilities include but are not limited to:

ul.li: Develop engagement strategies in collaboration with the ARM
Monitor performance against engagement strategies, make adjustments to meet sales goals
Coordinate with the Wellness organization to understand health and wellness solutions and integrate the CEC into the sales strategy
Ensure timely and accurate reporting by the sales staff in Spectrum for sales funnel reporting and use with strategic plans
Focused on sales and retention effectiveness to exceed sales and growth goals
Direct reporting responsibility of the Agency Relationship Manager, Inside Sales Executive (if locally based),
Oversees referral activity from the ARM to other sales and retention resources
Coordinates management and strategic alignment with NSO leadership to assure POD efficiency
Responsible for broker hierarchy management between Pods
Accountable to improve the effectiveness and execution of the sales associates and supporting sales processes to increase close ratios, quote volumes, products per customer, etc.
Responsible to conduct broker meetings, ride-a-longs, pre and post-call management sessions to improve sales executive performance
Coaching and training of sales resources on delivering The Humana Story and the use of analytics to drive consistency in sales messaging and results
Supports increased focus on human capital development, standardized sales and sales management processes
Responsible for recruiting and hiring of POD resources
Sales and Account Management
Business Planning
Customer Value Chain, Competitive Intelligence, Humana Business Model
Humana Brands, Products, Services
Builds Human Capital
Champions the Customer
Implementation / Execution
Prior demonstrated leadership leading the strategies and decision making for a sales team
Strong relationship building skills
Strong verbal and written communication skills
Bachelor’s degree
Demonstrated sales and account management experience in the health solutions industry
Knowledge of Humana’s internal policies, procedures and systems

div.span: At Humana, we know your well-being is important to you, and it’s important to us too. That’s why we’re committed to making resources available to you that will enable you to become happier, healthier, and more productive in all areas of your life. If you share our passion for helping people, we likely have the right place for you at Humana. After applying, we encourage you to join our Talent Network as well, so you can stay informed and up to date on what’s happening around our organization in the changing world of healthcare.
